channel.title: xp on The TechGlider
channel.description: Recent content in xp on The TechGlider

item.title: Back to linux and switching to WordPress...
item.description: I am glad to tell you that I have got rid of windows XP (again!) after muddling my head for 2 days trying to make it stable on my system. Now, I feel better that I gave it up in just 4 days of use and got rid of shame (read about it here) I was feeling that I installed XP again. I now have 2 variants of linux viz. Ubuntu 8.

item.title: TechGlider logo, finally designed
item.description: I am happy :-) to inform all of you that I have finally designed a logo for the TechGlider: Although I am not that satisfied with the logo, but I think it will do for the time being. Any suggestions for improvement of the logo are welcome. I couldn’t finish the development of TechGlider this week (designing a logo really takes too much of time ;-)
